parameter.label: Scheduler Id
parameter.tooltip: The scheduler for which to retrieve records

parameter.label: Starting Date
parameter.tooltip: The starting date from which to retrieve data (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameter.label: Page Token
parameter.tooltip: The value to use as the offset for the page of submissions to return. The submission that matches this value will not be included in the results.

parameters.parameter:
<%= starting_data = {} if @results.has_key? ('Call Self') starting_data = JSON.parse(@results['Call Self']['Output']) end
# Summarize Retrieved Data into Starting Data event_types = starting_data['event_types'] || {} scheduled_minutes = starting_data['scheduled_minutes'] || 0 actual_minutes = starting_data['actual_minutes'] || 0
retrieved_data = JSON.parse( @results['Retrieve Data']['Submissions List JSON'] ) retrieved_data.each{|record| scheduled_minutes += record['values']['Event Duration'].to_i actual_minutes += record['values']['Event Duration Actual'].to_i event_type = record['values']['Event Type'] event_time = Time.parse( record['values']['Event Time'] ).strftime("%H") actual_duration = record['values']['Event Duration Actual'] wait_time = record['values']['Wait Time']
if !event_type.nil? if !event_types.has_key? ( event_type ) event_types[event_type] = { "scheduledAppointments" => 1, "withDuration" => 0, "withWaitTime" => 0, "appointmentTimes" => { event_time => 1 } } if !actual_duration.to_s.empty? event_types[event_type]['withDuration'] = 1 event_types[event_type]['totalDuration'] = actual_duration.to_i event_types[event_type]['averageDuration'] = actual_duration.to_i end if !wait_time.to_s.empty? event_types[event_type]['withWaitTime'] = 1 event_types[event_type]['totalWaitTime'] = wait_time.to_i event_types[event_type]['averageWaitTime'] = wait_time.to_i end else current_type = event_types[event_type] current_type["scheduledAppointments"] += 1 if !actual_duration.to_s.empty? current_type["withDuration"] += 1 if current_type["totalDuration"].nil? current_type["totalDuration"] = actual_duration.to_i else current_type["totalDuration"] += actual_duration.to_i end current_type["averageDuration"] = ((current_type["totalDuration"] / current_type["withDuration"]).round) if !current_type["totalDuration"].nil? end if !wait_time.to_s.empty? current_type["withWaitTime"] += 1 if current_type["totalWaitTime"].nil? current_type["totalWaitTime"] = wait_time.to_i else current_type["totalWaitTime"] += wait_time.to_i end current_type["averageWaitTime"] = ((current_type["totalWaitTime"] / current_type["withWaitTime"]).round) if !current_type["totalWaitTime"].nil? end
if current_type["appointmentTimes"].has_key? (event_time) current_type["appointmentTimes"][event_time] += 1 else current_type["appointmentTimes"][event_time] = 1 end end end }
{ "event_types" => event_types, "scheduled_minutes" => scheduled_minutes, "actual_minutes" => actual_minutes }.to_json
%>

parameter.label: Scheduler Id
parameter.tooltip: The scheduler for which to retrieve records

parameter.label: Starting Date
parameter.tooltip: The starting date from which to retrieve data (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameter.label: Page Token
parameter.tooltip: The value to use as the offset for the page of submissions to return. The submission that matches this value will not be included in the results.

parameter.label: Kapp Slug
parameter.tooltip: The slug of the Kapp to find submissions in.

parameter.label: Form Slug
parameter.tooltip: The slug of the Form to find submissions in. If none provided, can only use Kapp Fields in search query

parameter.label: Form Type
parameter.tooltip: The Type of Form to find submissions in.

parameter.label: Core State
parameter.tooltip: Searches for submissions that have a core state that matches this parameter. If no value is provided, the results will contain submissions in all core states.

parameter.label: Limit
parameter.tooltip: Limit the number of results returned. If not provided, the server will limit the results to 25 submissions. Maximum limit 1000

parameter.label: Query
parameter.tooltip: Query to use to fetch submissions. (i.e values[First Name]="Fred")

parameters.parameter: values[Scheduler Id]="<%=@inputs['Scheduler Id']%>" AND values[Event Date]="<%=@inputs['Starting Date']%>"

parameter.label: Timeline
parameter.tooltip: Date property to search by. The default value is createdAt.

parameter.label: Direction
parameter.tooltip: Result Set sorting direction. The default value is descending.

parameter.label: Start Date/Time
parameter.tooltip: Start date/time of the timeline. This value should be used to both refine and limit the search results. Format should be yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'

parameter.label: End Date/Time
parameter.tooltip: End date/time of the timeline. This value should be used to both refine and limit the search results. Formatshould be yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'

parameter.label: Next Page Token
parameter.tooltip: The value to use as the offset for the page of submissions to return. The submission that matches this value will not be included in the results.
